short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: give a spark is email signature tool through which you can set your email signature on different emails.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
this extension sets the email signature on yahoo  and outlook mail.
give-a-spark email signature
There is a huge opportunity lost every time an email is sent without a person and company’s brand information.
give-a-spark allows you to share your social profiles and promote information you care about in every email you send.

With give-a-spark you can easily:
✓ Link to all your Social networks and profiles
✓ you can Share your  Legal disclaimers, statuses, quotes, brand logo etc.
✓ set email signature in HTML  format or just copy the html and paste it directly into signature.
